name: Premium Wool Sweater
description: Hand-knit merino wool sweater in a classic fit. Perfect for chilly evenings.

reviews.comment: Extremely comfortable and warm! Perfect for winter.
Great quality but runs a bit small.

name: Leather Weekend Bag
description: Genuine leather weekender bag with multiple compartments. Perfect for short trips.

reviews.comment: Beautiful bag but heavier than expected.

name: Ceramic Pour-Over Set
description: Artisanal ceramic coffee pour-over set with natural filter. Elevate your morning routine.

reviews.comment: Makes the best coffee I've ever had at home!

name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Premium over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

reviews.comment: Best purchase ever for my daily commute!
Great sound quality but a bit tight on my head.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB mechanical keyboard with customizable keys and ergonomic design for gamers and typists.

reviews.comment: Typing feels amazing! The RGB lights are stunning.

name: Canvas Utility Jacket
description: Water-resistant canvas jacket with multiple pockets. Stylish and functional for outdoor activities.
